title: Deep fake alert!
selftext:
Scamsters sponsoring deep fake videos on @facebook India. Featuring Mukesh Ambani, Nandan Nilekani, Narayana Murthy and Rajdeep Sardesai. 

Seems too real. You just need to listen to the diction of each of the speakers to know it's not them. And in addition doesn't look like it's been created by Indians (again cue from how they said the names, and Indians rarely speak in terms of millions) 

This came up on my Dad's Facebook feed. Obviously a lot of non tech savvy people could fall prey.
comments: Saw the same last month with Sam Altman in a zoom call with other open AI employees. Took me a while to understand it was a deepfake. My parents are so screwed.
What happened? What did your parents do?
Irony is if u ever report them facebook reply it's not a scam they can't remove this..
My parents invested believing itâ€™s true. Itâ€™s so tough to ensure and explain parents the concept of deep fake videos .
